articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Sites of Power Stations
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Sites of Power Stations
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the construction sites of the cascade power stations along the River Chongchon.
					 Going round Huichon Power Stations Nos. 5, 8, 9 and 11, he learned about the progress made in the construction and generating capacities and convened a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting referred to the importance of the construction of power stations in building an economic power and discussed measures to push forward with the dam construction.
					
					 The premier also made field surveys of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and the Ryongjin Cooperative Farm in Kaechon City, South Phyongan Province.
					
					 He took measures to operate the generating equipment in full capacity at the complex and generate electricity to the maximum and thus contribute to solve the problem of electricity.
					
					 He stressed the need for the agricultural officials and workers to do farm work with sincerity, bearing in mind the intension of the party on keeping hold on agriculture as a major thrust in the efforts for the economic construction and the improvement of the people's living standard this year.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Leaves
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Leaves
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his party left here Monday.

articles.title: Women of Cuban Embassy Visit Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Women of Cuban Embassy Visit Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Women of the Cuban embassy visited the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital Monday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The guests looked round different treatment wards and sick-rooms and the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 Administrator Iliana Almaguer Rodriguez said after visiting there:
					
					 The Pyongyang Maternity Hospital conveys the warm love of the great leaders for the generations to come.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the intentions of the preceding leaders, has shown profound love and care for the women and children.
					
					 Going round the hospital, I could deeply feel this.
					
					 I wish the Korean people greater success in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's New Year Address this year.
					
					 The guests presented souvenirs to the hospital.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Encouraged by New Year Address in DPRK
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Encouraged by New Year Address in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, in his New Year address set agriculture as a major thrust of the country's effort in the struggle for economic construction and improvement of the people's standard of living.
					 He underscored the need for the agricultural sector to proactively introduce scientific farming methods and do farm work in a responsible manner so as to hit without fail the target of agricultural production set by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The agricultural workers across the country are fully determined to increase the agricultural production this year in hearty response to the address.
					
					 Last year, they made a boost in agricultural production despite of difficulties and undesirable weather conditions.
					
					 South Hamgyong, Hwanghae and other provincial rural economy committees made big efforts to further display the advantages of sub-workteam management system, thus encouraging farmers to strive for increased yield.
					
					 Last year witnessed an increase of the area for cultivation of high-yielding crops throughout the country.
					
					 The introduction of advanced farming methods and techniques has put the farming on a more scientific and intensive basis.
					
					 After setting the agricultural field as the major thrust in economic construction, Kim Jong Un has energetically led the work to direct all efforts to farming.
					
					 The agricultural workers are deeply convinced through the experience they gained last year that they can hit without fail the target of agricultural production set by the WPK this year as they are led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Rally Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Rally Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square Monday to carry out the tasks supreme leader Kim Jong Un set forth in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, those of party, power, administration and economic bodies, universities, industrial establishments and farms in Pyongyang, heroes, meritorious persons, people from all walks of life and youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					 Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that the New Year Address serves as an encouraging banner instilling conviction in rosy future of Kim Il Sung's Korea and revolutionary pride into all service personnel and people and important guidelines showing a shortcut to fresh leap forward and innovations.
					
					 The entire Party, the whole army and all the people waged an all-out offensive in support of the Party's new line of developing the two fronts simultaneously and thus achieved brilliant successes in building a thriving socialist country and defending socialism last year, he noted.
					
					 These achievements are the precious fruition of Kim Jong Un's rare wisdom and outstanding leadership ability and his warm love for the people, he added.
					
					 He called on officials, party members and other working people in Pyongyang to make contributions to glorifying this year as a year of grandiose struggle, a year of sea changes.
					
					 He underscored the need for them to resolutely preserve and defend the ideas, authority and leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and thoroughly establish the Party's monolithic leadership system and thus make the revolutionary ranks purer and consolidate the unbreakable single-minded unity.
					
					 He also called on them to firmly arm themselves with great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and wage a dynamic drive to implement the Party's ideology and defend its policies and thus become vanguard fighters in the worthwhile general advance for adding brilliance to glorious era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called for making the traits of attaching importance to military affairs and aiding the People's Army prevail in the capital city by regarding those affairs as the most important state affair and helping it with sincerity.
					
					 He also underlined the need to open up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country this year.
					
					 Speeches were made by Ri Chol Man, vice-premier who doubles as minister of Agriculture, Tong Jong Ho, minister of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, Mun Chun Gwang, researcher at Kim Il Sung University, and Choe Myong Hak, chairman of the Kim Chaek University of Technology Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 They vowed to make a decisive turn in agricultural production this year to demonstrate the validity and vitality of the socialist rural theses.
					
					 They noted that a drive would be intensified to carry out the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and the letter he sent to the participants in the great workshop of officials in the field of construction.
					
					 They also vowed to make a tangible contribution to building a rich and powerful nation by waging a drive for going beyond the cutting edge and taking the lead in making a shortcut to the building of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 They said that it is the firm faith and will of all young people to become heroes in the on-going drive to bring a heyday of the glorious era of Kim Jong Un and pioneers in pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology.
					
					 The rally was followed by a demonstration.

articles.title: Children's New Year Performance Goes on
articles.content:
Children's New Year Performance Goes on
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren's New Year performance "May You Have Bright Future" is going on at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace before full houses. 
					 Among the audience were Pyongyangites including school youth and children and foreign guests here. 
					
					 The performance starts with a prologue "We Offer New Year's Greeting to the Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Put on the stage are such colorful numbers as song of triplets "The Happiest Day", sextet "Our Father Marshal Kim Jong Il", serial songs "Our Eternal Sun", song and dance "The General Goes to the Front While Children to Camp" and accordion concert "We Are the Happiest in the World". 
					
					 The performers impressively represent the ardent yearning and reverence of all schoolchildren across the country for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Trio and chorus "Marshal Is Our Happiness and Future", folk instrumental trio "My Best Country" and other pieces show well that the future of the rising generation is very rosy and bright thanks to Kim Jong Un, who is making a new history of noble love for posterity and future. 
					
					 Music and dance "We Will Follow the Marshal to the Last", chorus "We Will Successfully Carry Forward the Lineage of Mangyongdae, the Lineage of Mt. Paektu" and other numbers truthfully represent the determination of all schoolchildren across the country to stoutly grow up to be the heir to the revolutionary cause of Juche and sons and daughters faithful to the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Large Blastings at Tideland Reclamation Site
articles.content:
Large Blastings at Tideland Reclamation Site
						
 Sonchon, January 5 (KCNA) -- Blastings of 70 000 and 30 000 cubic meters of  earth took place in the project for reclaiming Honggondo tideland on Sunday.
					 The successful blastings made it possible to push ahead with the project for Dike No. 3.
					
					 Through these blastings the officials and builders of the North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Complex launched a dynamic drive to glorify this significant year with successes in the tideland reclamation.

articles.title: Bamboo Craft "Peacock", Gift to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Bamboo Craft "Peacock", Gift to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK is bamboo craft "Peacock", a gift presented to President Kim Il Sung by the general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of India (Marxist) on the occasion of his 80th birthday (April 15, 1992).
					 The general secretary, who had revered the President as an elder leader of the international labor movement, had the honor with the audience of the President and received important teachings from him during his visits to the DPRK.
					
					 He made a deep study of Kim Il Sung's famous works to learn after the experience the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) gained in leading the revolution and construction.
					
					 Out of deep reverence for the President, he and leading officials of his party decided to present a gift of best wishes to the President on that occasion and prepared the bamboo craft depicting peacock, the national bird of India. 
					
					 The bamboo craft shows a peacock in its pride with beautiful markings of plumage.
					
					 He handed the gift over to the head of his party delegation to visit Pyongyang, expressing his regretfulness for not presenting the gift to Kim Il Sung by himself. Saying that the gift represents the reverence of all his party members, he asked the head of the delegation to convey it to the President with best wishes.

articles.title: Senior Secondary School Students Win Software Registrations
articles.content:
Senior Secondary School Students Win Software Registrations 
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- All of 22 students of the senior 3-1 class at Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 won software registrations at the 24th National Software Contest and Exhibition held here last year.
					 It was the first time that all the members of a class took the registrations.
					
					 They were appreciated for their good programs.
					
					 What caught the experts' eyes were the collection of games (second edition), a program for intensive learning of English vocabulary, e-book "Collection of World's Famous Tales for Children" for intellectual development and others.
					
					 The collection of games took the first place for its varieties including numerical and pictorial puzzles while the program for intensive learning of English vocabulary the second.
					
					 The third place was taken by the e-book and a program for fast reading by tablet computer.

articles.title: Sci-tech Achievements for Coal Production Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Sci-tech Achievements for Coal Production Made in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Coal Science Branch of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has made a lot of sci-tech achievements for increased coal production.
					 Its researchers succeeded in introducing bundled props in mining anthracite, making it possible to mine in bulk. This method helps ensure pit security with less supply materials while raising the mining rate.
					
					 They also developed a new type of pneumatic coal dressing machine. It, simple in coal dressing, needs less consumption of electricity than wet dressing.
					
					 Other researchers of the branch invented a device of controlling tramcar speed by thyristor and methods of making lube oil with coal tar and preventing leaks of underground water in vertical pits.

articles.title: Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Calls for Ushering in New Phase for National Reunification
articles.content:
Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Calls for Ushering in New Phase for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), was interviewed by KCNA on Monday.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for respecting and successfully implementing the north-south joint declarations, underscoring the need to reject outside forces and firmly adhere to the idea of "By our nation itself" in order to settle the issue of the country's reunification as desired by the Koreans, the chief recalled, adding:
					
					 The tasks set forth by him for the country's reunification serve as a signpost for this year's struggle to accomplish the cause of reunification and a key to its victory. 
					
					 Vanguard fighters of the AINDF and patriotic popular masses are evincing their will to turn out in a nation-wide struggle for reunification.
					
					 The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Pusan Reunification Solidarity and other organizations in south Korea praised the idea of "By our nation itself" as the supreme principle and all-powerful treasured sword for achieving reunification to which all Koreans should hold fast.
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, the Women's Solidarity of South Korea and the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea expressed their will to take the lead in the struggle to bury the forces opposed to the nation and reunification and make a new history of independent reunification.
					
					 No matter how desperately the separatist forces at home and abroad may work, they can never quell the strong desire of Koreans to achieve independent reunification and national prosperity.
					
					 All Koreans should open up a new phase of independent reunification and peace and prosperity, united close, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" under the banner of genuine patriotism.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un is standing at the helm of the on-going movement for the country's reunification.
					
					 Vanguard fighters of the AINDF will make dynamic efforts to make 2014 a year marking a new phase in independent reunification, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: WPK Is Great Guide of Songun Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
WPK Is Great Guide of Songun Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial article says that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) headed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un is a great guide of the Songun revolution. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The WPK has a glorious history in which it won victories under the uplifted banner of Juche and Songun under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK is an invincible revolutionary party which leads the Songun revolution, guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, a steel-strong party which strengthens the driving force of the Songun revolution in every way with the Korean People's Army as a model and a great mother party which translates the ideal of the people into reality by dint of Songun.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of Songun revolution is sure to win thanks to the WPK, which leads the people to a bright future by sheltering them from wind and rain, and the revolutionary army and people who believe in the party and bring about all glories together with the party.
					
					 The WPK has demonstrated its might as the great guide of the Songun revolution in the new century of Juche as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un represents the great sun of Songun Korea as he teaches the DPRK's army and people how they should make a revolution and brings an immensely bright future to them, being responsible for their destiny and future. 
					
					 It is an ever-victorious treasured sword for the rosy future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea to develop the WPK into an eternally glorious great guide of the Songun revolution, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Fresh Headway in Reunification Movement
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Fresh Headway in Reunification Movement
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Monday says in an article that all Koreans in the north, south and overseas should surely make fresh headway in the reunification movement this year by invariably making advance along the road indicated by the line of one Korea, the general principle of reunification for all Koreans, which was set forth by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 In order to settle the reunification issue it is necessary to reject foreign forces, hold fast to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself and make a dynamic struggle for defending the security and peace of the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is impossible to achieve reconciliation and unity of the nation without defusing the confrontation between the north and south.
					
					 We cannot remain a passive onlooker any longer to the painful situation in which the Koreans live, divided by foreign forces.
					
					 We should put an end to the era of confrontation in which one side slings mud at and shows hostility to the other.
					
					 The confrontation between the north and south is harmful to solving the reunification issue, hinders the reconciliation and unity between compatriots and leads the north-south relations to the worst catastrophe. This will serve merely as an occasion for the forces that are undesirous of seeing one Korea to fish in troubled waters.
					
					 Manifold difficulties and trials are lying in the way of national reunification, but our nation is convinced of greeting the day of independent reunification, peace and prosperity without fail.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, south and overseas should dynamically wage a nationwide reunification movement by uniting close in the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the true banner of patriotism.
					
					 By doing so, we should open up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year at any cost and make the desire for reunification and patriotism grow stronger across the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamically Advancing along Road of Songun
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dynamically Advancing along Road of Songun
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Sovereignty, vital rights, destiny and dignity of the country and the nation rest on strong self-defensive power, Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Monday, stressing the DPRK will dynamically advance along the road of Songun.
					 Powerful military capabilities provide a sure guarantee for resolutely foiling the imperialists' aggression moves, protecting the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation and triumphantly advancing the revolution and construction, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is the truth proved by the stern trials of history. It is thanks to the strong might for self-defence and war deterrence that the DPRK is protecting the country's sovereignty and peace and fully displaying the dignity of the nation, standing firm against the U.S. This helped the DPRK smash all the aggression moves of enemies and defend the country's sovereignty and dignity and peace.
					
					 Physical strength, powerful war deterrence only can guarantee durable peace. Peace can never be protected by words as long as one party is carrying a dagger in its belt to invade the other party.
					
					 It is the firm determination of the Workers' Party and government of the DPRK to firmly defend the sovereignty and peace of the country and dignity of the nation by dint of powerful strength for self-defence under the situation where the dark clouds of a nuclear war against the DPRK are persistently hanging over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Korean people will always advance along the road of Songun no matter what others may say and how the situation may change.

articles.title: KCTU Members Vow to Force Present Regime to Step Down
articles.content:
KCTU Members Vow to Force Present Regime to Step Down
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- More than 1 300 members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) and other citizens held a meeting at Seoul Square on Jan. 4 to vow to frustrate the suppression of the labor movement, check privatization and force the present regime to step down.
					 At the meeting speakers denounced the police's forcible entry into the headquarters of the KCTU in December last year and its violence there as an unprecedented tyranny and suppression of the labor movement.
					
					 They expressed the will to turn out in an action to force the present "government" to step down as it regards the workers as enemy.
					
					 They called on all unionists to get united to stage a general strike and foil the authorities' crackdown on the labor movement.
					
					 They would wage a persistent general strike targeting the chief executive as they did by joining the Railway Trade Union in its action against privatization, they held.
					
					 The participants in the meeting held a memorial service for Ri Nam Jong who burned himself to death on December 31 last year demanding the resignation of the puppet chief executive and the probe into the truth about the illegal election.

articles.title: Korea Is Sure to Re Reunified: Overseas Korean
articles.content:
Korea Is Sure to Re Reunified: Overseas Korean 
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan, issued a statement on Jan. 2 calling for thoroughly implementing the tasks for national reunification supreme leader Kim Jong Un set forth in his New Year Address.
					 The statement said that the tasks for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address serve as important guidelines to be held fast to in this year's national reunification movement.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 All the Koreans should get united and usher in a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity with the nation-wide pro-reunification patriotic struggle.
					
					 The driving force of the country's reunification is the Korean nation in the north, the south and abroad. And the country's reunification could be achieved independently in conformity with the nation's interests and demand only when the Koreans thoroughly embody the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Respecting and implementing the north-south joint declarations is the fundamental prerequisite to bring earlier the country's reunification.
					
					 We would wage a dynamic struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for reunification common to the nation in the new century and milestones for peace and prosperity.
					
					 We express firm belief that Korea will surely be reunified thanks to the immortal feats Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in the sacred cause of national reunification and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Mission in Hong Kong, China
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Mission in Hong Kong, China
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, sent a floral basket to the DPRK mission in Hong Kong, China on the occasion of the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The general director of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong and the chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong also sent floral baskets to the DPRK mission.

articles.title: Kuwaiti Paper Carries Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography
articles.content:
Kuwaiti Paper Carries Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography 
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was carried by the Kuwait Times on December 29 last year.
					 The paper was illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Ghanaian Political Party, Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Ghanaian Political Party, Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- A Ghanaian political party and a Nigerian organization expressed support to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The National Democratic Congress of Ghana said on Wednesday:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address not only indicates the scientific way to turn the DPRK into a thriving nation in the near future but also greatly encourages us aspiring the development of the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 We positively support the just stand to resolve the issue of country's reunification by the Korean nation itself without interference of foreign forces.
					
					 The WPK will lead to victory the Korean people's struggle for carrying out the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 On the same day the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association said in a statement:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, in his New Year Address, set forth the tasks for the Korean people to make fresh headway in the national reunification movement this year, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, underscoring the need to reject foreign forces and hold fast to the standpoint of By Korean Nation Itself, positively struggle for defending security of the nation and peace and establish the favourable climate for improved relations between the north and the south.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association fully supports the tasks for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un and is convinced that all the Korean people would open a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity in firm unity this year.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de plantas hidroelectricas de Chongchongang
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre campo de construccion de plantas hidroelectricas de Chongchongang
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrio el campo de construccion de las plantas hidroelectricas escalonadas de Chongchongang.
					Al pasar revista al campo de construccion  de las plantas hidroelectricas de Huichon no. 5, 8, 9 y 11, se cercioro del estado de la obra y la capacidad de produccion electrica y convoco una reunion de consulta.
					
					En la ocasion se refirio a la importancia de la construccion de las plantas mencionadas en la edificacion de una potencia economica y se debatieron las medidas para culminar rapido el levantamiento del dique.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier visito el Complejo Termoelectrico de Pyongyang y la Granja Cooperativa de Ryongjin de la ciudad de Kaechon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					En el primer lugar, Pak tomo las medidas para aumentar al maximo la generacion electrica al poner en pleno funcionamiento los equipos concernientes y hacer aporte a resolver el problema de electricidad.
					
					En la granja cooperativa apunto que conscientes del proposito del Partido de mantener la agricultura como rumbo de ataque principal en la campana de este ano para la construccion economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo, los funcionarios y trabajadores de la rama agricola deben hacer bien las faenas agricolas.

articles.title: CRPP condena a autoridades surcoreanas que obstaculizan mejora de relaciones intercoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP condena a autoridades surcoreanas que obstaculizan mejora de relaciones intercoreanas
						
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que desde el principio del Ano Nuevo, en el suelo surcoreano suceden cosas que obstaculizan el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 5 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Ahora todos los coreanos y todo el mundo apoyan totalmente y aplauden el historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y desean unanimemente que se mejoren cuanto antes las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y se abra la nueva coyuntura de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la reintegracion territorial de Corea.
					
					El mensaje del Mariscal refleja el deseo de toda la nacion y los esfuerzos constantes y la voluntad firme de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre la construccion pacifica de economia, la elevacion de los niveles de la vida del pueblo, el relajamiento de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana, la mejora de las relaciones N-S, la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Por el contrario, en el Sur de Corea suceden cosas desagradables.
					
					Desde el principio del Ano Nuevo, se oyen peores disparates que envenenan el clima de mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y se levanta la ola de confrontacion bajo la consigna de "represalia" y "exterminio", mientras se libran los freneticos ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC con la participacion de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas y hasta los infantes de marina del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Para colmo, se escuchan las blasfemias sobre la buena fe de la RPDC tales como "sinceridad dudosa" y "tactica de doble rasero".
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos responden a la insistencia justa de la RPDC en mantener firmemente la posicion de rechazar a las fuerzas foraneas y el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" con fortalecer el contubernio con EE.UU. y la colaboracion nuclear anti-RPDC, a la demanda de defender la seguridad y paz de la nacion con palabras belicosas y ejercicios belicos y al llamamiento a cesar la difamacion en aras de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas con recrudecer la calumnia.
					
					Esta conducta significa que ellos no tienen ni la menor intencion de mejorar las relaciones N-S y quieren marchar este ano tambien por el camino de enfrentamiento y guerra.
					
					La posicion y la actitud diametralmente diferentes, mostradas por el Norte y el Sur al principio del Ano Nuevo, dejan en claro quien es el provocador que echa a la catastrofe las relaciones intercoreanas y destruye la paz.
					
					Nadie hara caso al que tiene mal genio aunque el hable con elocuencia.
					
					ã€€Las autoridades surcoreanas deben corregir primero la posicion y actitud conflictivas si quieren decir algo sobre las relaciones N-S.
					
					La mejora de relaciones intercoreanas no se puede lograr con los esfuerzos unilaterales de una parte.
					
					El futuro de esos vinculos depende totalmente de la actitud que asuman en el futuro las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Representante de sucursal de FDNA se decide a luchar por reunificacion independiente
articles.content:
Representante de sucursal de FDNA se decide a luchar por reunificacion independiente
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- Jo Il Min, representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, dijo el dia 6 a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea como sigue:
					En su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un senalo que deben rechazar a las fuerzas extranjeras, mantener con firmeza la posicion del ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", respetar las declaraciones conjuntas y ejecutarlas cabalmente para resolver el problema de la reunificacion del pais conforme a la aspiracion y la demanda de los connacionales.
					
					Las tareas presentadas en la parte por la reunificacion de la patria son el poste de meta de lucha de este ano por la realizacion de la causa de la reintegracion y la llave de la victoria en esta empresa.
					
					Los combatientes del FDNA y las masas patrioticas expresan la voluntad de levantarse con vigor en la lucha pannacional por la reunificacion.
					
					El Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria, la Solidaridad de Pusan por la Reunificacion y otras entidades insistieron en que el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" es el maximo principio y el remedio omnipotente en realizar la reunificacion a ser tomado invariablemente por todos los connacionales.
					
					La direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APJERP), la Solidaridad Nacional de Mujeres y la Solidaridad por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte expresaron la voluntad de tomar la delantera en la lucha por eliminar a las fuerzas antinacionales y anti-reunificacion y de crear la nueva historia de la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Aunque se tornan perversas las maquinaciones de las fuerzas divisionistas internas y externas no pueden impedir jamas la aspiracion de los connacionales a la reunificacion independiente y la prosperidad nacional.
					
					Uniendose monoliticamente bajo la bandera de verdadero patriotismo y el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", todos los connacionales deben abrir nueva fase de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Hoy dia, en la delantera del movimiento por la reunificacion del pais se encuentra el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Los combatientes vanguardistas del FDNA lucharan dinamicamente por adornar 2014 como ano para abrir la nueva coyuntura de la reunificacion independiente enalteciendo al Mariscal como salvador de esta empresa.

articles.title: Capitalinos juran en el mitin cumplir tareas indicadas en mensaje de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Capitalinos juran en el mitin cumplir tareas indicadas en mensaje de Kim Jong Un 
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de capitalinos para jurar el cumplimiento de las tareas indicadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					Participaron en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, los funcionarios de entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, organismos del partido, Poder y economia, universidades, fabricas, empresas y granjas, heroes, benemeritos y trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y estudiantes en la capital. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang. 
					
					El informante dijo que el mensaje del Mariscal sirve de bandera estimulante y guia programatica que infunde en todos los militares y civiles coreanos la dignidad revolucionaria y la fe en el futuro radiante de la Corea del Sol e indica el atajo a nuevos saltos e innovaciones. 
					
					Enumero los relevantes exitos alcanzados el ano pasado por todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo en la construccion de un Estado prospero y en la defensa del socialismo segun la nueva linea del partido sobre el desarrollo paralelo. 
					
					Los exitos alcanzados el ano pasado son valiosos frutos de la inteligencia extraordinaria, la probada capacidad directiva y el ardiente amor por el pueblo del Mariscal, enfatizo.
					
					Insistio en que los funcionarios, los militantes del partido y los trabajadores de la capital contribuyan a hacer del presente un ano de gran lucha y grandes innovaciones. 
					
					Destaco la necesidad de defender con firmeza la idea, la autoridad y las proezas de direccion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, establecer mas estrictamente el sistema de unica direccion del partido y mantener por todos los medios la pureza de las filas revolucionarias y la invencible unidad monolitica. 
					
					Ratifico que se debe armar firmemente con el gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y librar la campana de materializacion y defensa de la idea y politicas del partido para hacerse vanguardias de la gran marcha para hacer brillar la gloriosa era de Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Hay que considerar los asuntos militares como los mas importantes del Estado y ayudar con sinceridad al ejercito popular para que reine en la capital el ambiente de dar importancia a los asuntos militares y de ayuda al ejercito, dijo.
					
					Prosiguio que se debe abrir este ano la nueva coyuntura de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					Le siguieron en usar la palabra el vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, Ri Chol Man, el ministro de Construccion e Industria de Materiales de Construccion, Tong Jong Ho, el investigador de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Mun Chun Gwang, y el presidente del Comite de la Union de la Juventud Socialista en la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Choe Myong Hak. 
					
					Los oradores expusieron la decision de registrar el cambio decisivo en la produccion agricola de este ano y poner en pleno juego la justeza y la vitalidad de la Tesis sobre el Problema Rural. 
					
					Subrayaron que lucharan intensamente por materializar las tareas indicadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal y el otro enviado a los participantes en el gran cursillo de la rama de construccion. 
					
					Enfatizaron que abriran al frente el atajo a la construccion de la economia basada en la intelectualidad levantando una oleada de alcanzar los niveles sofisticados y contribuiran verdaderamente a la construccion de una patria prospera. 
					
					Apuntaron que los jovenes coreanos guardan la firme conviccion y voluntad de hacerse heroes y precursores en la conquista de las tecnologias de punta en la epoca actual para abrir la gloriosa era de prosperidad de Kim Jong Un. 
					
					A continuacion, hubo una manifestacion multitudinaria.
